mapper.select:
select id, name, sku, customer_id customerId, specification_model specificationModel, status, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, remarks, customer_code customerCode, good_length goodLength, good_width goodWidth, good_height goodHeight, commodity_value commodityValue, date_of_manufacture dateOfManufacture, expiration_date expirationDate,customer_name customerName from good where 1=1
and good.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and good.sku like concat('%',#{form.sku},'%')
and good.customerName like concat('%',#{form.customerName},'%')
order by createTime desc
